channel.title: Gauntlet Con 2019 - What do you want to see?
channel.description:
Hey everyone!
We're busy planning Gauntlet Con 2019, but we'd love your thoughts and input. We'll be recruiting volunteer GMs starting next week, and we'd love to give those volunteers a good idea what YOU'RE looking for. Help us out, but taking a few minutes with this form:
https://forms.gle/erfTYESMgPwuYuTa8
Richard

item.title: Gauntlet Con 2019 - What do you want to see?
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Hey everyone!

We’re busy planning Gauntlet Con 2019, but we’d love your thoughts and input. We’ll be recruiting volunteer GMs starting next week, and we’d love to give those volunteers a good idea what YOU’RE looking for. Help us out, but taking a few minutes with this form:

docs.google.com

Gauntlet Con 2019 Interest Survey

Gauntlet Con is an online convention that will take place from Thursday, October 24, 2019 to Sunday, October 27, 2019. We're busy planning for Gauntlet Con 2019, but we need your input! If you're planning to attend, or even just thinking about it,...

Richard

Read full topic
